amendment.description: To reserve not less than 2 percent of the amount appropriated under the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 in each fiscal year for payments to Indian tribes and tribal organizations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2822 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 73.

action.text: Amendment SA 2822 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Franken.
